title: Special Topics in Sociology
description: Taught on a rolling basis by faculty members with each offering varying by instructor. Topics are announced by the department. May be repeated for credit.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): SOCY 1 or SOCY 10 or SOCY 15. Enrollment is restricted to sophomores, juniors, and seniors.

class_notes: Topic: Media Activism. Delves into the dynamic interplay between media and activism, underscoring the ways in which grassroots communities use diverse media forms for mutual aid and social change
